property OnClientConnected : TStreamedAudioEvent read FOnClientConnected write FOnClientConnected
The OnClientConnected event is raised when a new client connects to the transmitter.
property OnClientDisconnected : TStreamedAudioEvent read FOnClientDisconnected write FOnClientDisconnected
The OnClientDisconnected event is raised when a client disconnects from the transmitter.
property OnDone : TOutputDoneEvent read FOnDone write FOndone
Raised when the component has finished its job or was stopped asynchronously.
property OnInputChanged : TInputChangedEvent read FOnInputChanged write FOnInputChanged
Raised when the component has finished playing one input source and is starting to play the next one.
property OnOverrun : TOverrunEvent read FOnOverrun write FOnOverrun
OnOverrun event is raised when this component provides data faster than the rest of audio-processing chain can consume.
property OnProgress : TOutputProgressEvent read FOnProgress write FOnProgress
OnProgress event is raised periodically to indicate output progress.
property OnStartedPlaying : TStreamedAudioEvent read FOnStartedPlaying write FOnStartedPlaying
This event informs you that the decoder has decoded the first chunk of audio data.
property OnStreamOpened : TStreamedAudioEvent read FOnStreamOpened write FOnStreamOpened
This event informs you that the audio stream has been opened successfully.
property OnThreadException : TThreadExceptionEvent read FOnThreadException write FOnThreadException
This event is raised if an exception has occurred.
property OnUnderrun : TUnderrunEvent read FOnUnderrun write FOnUnderrun
OnUnderrun event is raised when the component has run out of data.
procedure OpenFile; virtual; abstract
Opens the file or stream if it is not already open.
procedure OpenFile; override
Called by the base methods of TAuFileIn class to open the file.
property OutBitsPerSample : Integer read FOutBitsPerSample write FOutBitsPerSample
Use this property to set the number of bits per sample in the resulting audio stream.
property OutBitsPerSample : Integer read FOutBitsPerSample write FOutBitsPerSample
Use this property to set the number of bits per sample in the resulting audio stream.
property OutBitsPerSample: Cardinal read FBPS write SetBPS default DefaultMPCBitsPerSample
Regardless of an encoder’s input bits per sample value Musepack always encodes its data in 32-bit samples.
property OutChannels : Integer read FOutChannels write FOutChannels
Use this property to set the number of channels in the resulting audio stream.
property OutChannels : Integer read FOutChannels write FOutChannels
Use this property to set the number of channels in the resulting audio stream.
property OutputChannels : TChannelsNumber read FOutputChannels write SetOutputChannels
Sets the number of channels for decoder output.
property OutSampleRate : Integer read FOutSampleRate write FOutSampleRate
Use this property to set thesample rate of the resulting audio stream.
property OutSampleRate : LongWord read FOutSampleRate write FOutSampleRate
Use this property to set the component’s output sample rate.
property OutSampleRate : LongWord read FOutSampleRate write SetOutSampleRate
Use this property to set the output sample rate.
property OutSampleRate : LongWord read FOutSampleRate write SetOutSampleRate
Use this property to set the sample rate for the resulting audio stream.
property OutSampleRate : Word read FOutSampleRate write SetOutSampleRate
Use this property to set output sample rate.
Delphi headers for ovencode.dll © 2007 Andrei Borovsky, (a.nosp@m.nb@symmetr.nosp@m.ica.net).
property Overruns : LongWord read FOverruns
This read only property returns the number of internal buffer overruns that have occurred during recording.
pointer to a buffer for mono data.
This Delphi unit provides a simple C-style interface for reading and writing WMA files.
procedure Pause
Pauses the output.
procedure PauseRecord
Call this method to pause recording.
property Port : LongWord read FPort write FPort
The number of port on which the component will listen for incoming connections.
property Position : Int64 read FPosition
The current reading position in the input stream in bytes.
procedure Prepare; override
Performs all the steps required to initialize output.
property Progress : Integer read GetProgress
Read Progress to get the output progress in percents.

property ProxyHost : String read FProxyHost write FProxyHost
If your application requires a proxy to connect to Internet, use this property to set the proxy host name.
property ProxyPort : LongWord read FProxyPort write FProxyPort
If your application requires a proxy to connect to Internet, use this property to set the proxy port value.
property ProxyProtocol : String read FProxyProtocol write FProxyProtocol
If your application requires a proxy to connect to Internet, use this property to set the proxy protocol.

property Quality : Single read FQuality write FQuality
The output file quality.
property Quality : TResamplerQuality read FQuality write FQuality
Use this property to set the trade-off between resampling quality and speed.
Descends from TAuConverter.
function ReadRIFFHeader(Stream : TStream;
var AudioInfo : TAudioInfo) : Boolean
A helper function that parses wav file header and gets audio data parameters.
property RecTime : Integer read FRecTime write SetRecTime
Use this property to set the recording duration (in seconds).
property RepeatCount : Integer read FRepeatCount write FRepeatCount
Use this property to tell the component how many times the contents of the DataBuffer should be replayed before the component reports the end of data.
A high-quality audio resampler.
procedure Resume
Resumes previously paused output.
procedure ResumeRecord
Call this method to resume paused recording.
This demo ripper can save ripped data into several formats and provides the option to listen to the audio as it is being ripped.

Lowest quality, but still not too bad.

procedure Run
After an input component has been assigned, call Run to start the audio processing chain.
